communication.TCP

Class TCPServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • communication.TCP.TCPMessage
      • communication.TCP.TCPServer

  • public class TCPServer
extends TCPMessage
    A TCP server, able to send and receive packets via its socket.
    Author:
    Charles MECHERIKI

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TCPServer(TCPParameters _TCPParameters)
      Constructs and initializes the TCP parameters and inet socket address of the server.
